name: Copy-Paste
description:
Copy-Paste is a game where you control an awesome computer named Cubit. He is very special because he has the ability to copy an object an paste it on an other ...

The game is playable online here : http://games.nicoplv.com/copy-paste/

Commands:
WSAD or arrows to walk
space to jump
right click to copy
left click to paste
middle click to shapeshift
escape to exit
